Name: Artwork/owner relationship
Description: This is a compound-value type is used to create a relationship between an artwork and owner of that artwork. The owner can be a person, a group of people, an institution, or a combination thereof. The information this type can contain, in addition to the artwork and owner(s) includes: Method of acquisition (such as purchase, gift, or bequest)Price of purchaseDate acquiredLast date ownedNote that all information is for a single periond of ownership. If the same person, group, or institution re-aquires an artwork after not owning it for a period of time, that should be entered as a separate artwork/owner relationship.

Properties.Name: Date acquired
Properties.Description: The date the artwork was acquired by this owner.

Properties.Name: Last date owned
Properties.Description: The date the artwork was sold, donated, etc. by this owner.

Properties.Name: Method of acquisition
Properties.Description: The manner in which the artwork was aquired (e.g. purchase, gift, bequest, etc.).

Properties.Name: Owner
Properties.Description: The person, people, institution, or institutions that own the artwork.

Properties.Name: Purchase price
Properties.Description: If the artwork was purchased, the amount the owner(s) paid for it.

Properties.Name: Purchase currency
Properties.Description: If the artwork was purchased, the currency in which the transaction occurred.
